page.title: 04A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content:
In about five minutes time Angela, Tom and Abigail came. We all went out to catch the{bus.} Ten minutes later the bus came and I sat in the back.
When we got to the second stop a girl called Kirsty came on. She was coming to Symondsbury School also because she is on{Work Experience.}We arrived at School at 8.35am. I just walked around the playground until it was time to go in.
When we got in we had the register. Mr.Mahoney told us to stand. We had Assembly. We sang a hymn and had a prayer. When Assembly was over we all sat down and Mr.Mahoney said that we would have spellings.
